attributes.action: Bring the British Army onto the streets of London
attributes.additional_details:
After the last few shocking nights, the amount of disorder is overwhelming our police force. Its not their fault but they arent prepared for this level of criminality! Therefore the Prime Minister must take brave and historic steps and bring the British Army onto the streets of our capital to help bring about order!

The damage this disorder is doing to our struggling economy could be fatal, so people of Britain let our government know how we want this shocking episode  to be brought to an end.
